page.title: 17Living in Ponsanooth.
page.content: Most people that live in Ponsanooth work somwhere else such as Falmouth, Truro or Redruth. A lot of old people live here in bungalows specially adapted to suit them. Some of the people are as old as 91. It is a friendly village and everyone gets on well together. We have recently acquired a new playing field which the old folk are not very pleased about because it is next to their back gardens.The Ponsanooth garden show is judged every year and the produce is auctioned for charity. There are dog training lessons at the Methodist Hall which are well attended because there is little else to do. Most people travel out of the village if they want entertainment such as sports, the cinema or the beach.
